this works men!! 100%.. i'm running at win7 64 bit. you gotta have poweriso dude, extract the t-kfstwr.cue (not the *.bin ok) to any folder, then run the set-up.exe, install the Microsoft XNA.  From the extracted folder TinyISO, copy the all files into your game folder (Kung Fu Strike - Warriors Rise).  then run KungFustrike.exe.. Oh and don't forget to seed this great torrent!!!
